import React from 'react'; const img_url = 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original'; const Carousel = (props) => { console.log(props.ac) return (

{props.ac.title[0]}

{props.ac.overview[0]}

{`Rating: ${props.ac.vote_average[0]}`}
{`Released: ${props.ac.release_date[0]}`}

{props.title}

{props.overview}

{`Rating: ${props.vote}`}
{`Released: ${props.release}`}

{props.title}

{props.overview}

{`Rating: ${props.vote}`}
{`Released: ${props.release}`}
Previous Next
) } export default Carousel;
